name: Executioner Weapon Training
prereq: Vigilante Dedication; Member Of The Gray Gardeners
summary: Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck.
description:
Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck. You become trained with the following weapons: battle axe, falchion, greataxe, and scimitar. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for these weapons.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
